text: Riverside Stadium is a ballpark located in Victoria, Texas which is the current home of the UHV Jaguars baseball team and the Victoria Generals of the Texas Collegiate League. It is the former home of the Victoria Rosebuds, who played in the AA classification Texas League from 1958 to 1961. The stadium was opened in 1947 as a part of Riverside Park. ==References== Category:UHV Jaguars baseball Category:College baseball venues in the United States Category:Baseball venues in the Coastal Bend (Texas) Category:Baseball venues in Texas Category:Buildings and structures in Victoria, Texas Category:Sports venues completed in 1947 Category:1947 establishments in Texas
title: Riverside Stadium (Victoria)
